title: N. R. Narayana Murthy
summary: Nagavara Ramarao Narayana Murthy CBE LH (born 20 August 1946) is an Indian billionaire businessman. He is the founder of Infosys,[5] and has been the chairman, chief executive officer (CEO), president, and chief mentor[6] of the company before retiring and taking the title chairman emeritus.[7][8][9] As of October 2021, his net worth was estimated at US$4.3 billion.[10]
